name: Beaked The Cultist
description:
Adds Beaked the Cultist as a new playable character.
BEAKED REQUIRES THE STSLIB MOD!

0.6.1
- Googly Eyes Mod Support!
- Machine Essence no longer boosts 0-HP heals.
- Sacrifice Doll + Gambling Chip fix.
- Costume arrows now loop properly.

0.6.0:
- Mantra now always 2-cost, upgrades to 5 damage.
- Pecker now always 2-cost.
- Bugfixes for Spirit cards.
- Attempt to fix campfire SFX bug.

If you contributed and don't see your name in the credits, please let us know!
